altername_name: EA Sports Double Header: EA Hockey & John Madden Football
EA Sports Double Header: John Madden Football & EA Hockey
EA Sports Double Header: EA Hockey + John Madden Football
name: EA Sports Double Header: EA Hockey / John Madden Football
overview: EA Sports Double Header is a compilation released in Europe. It is developed by developed by Park Place Productions and published by Electronic Arts. It contains the two games EA Hockey and John Madden Football. Most likely released in 1993. The game is also available with a vertical Swedish manual instead of the normal four language horizontal manual.
